name: idadm
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cdoma, cfv(c0, c1)), c1), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(c1, cfv(choma, c2), c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cdoma, cfv(c0, c1)), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(c1, cfv(choma, c2), c1)))
-| wi(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(c1, cfv(choma, c2), c1)), wceq(cfv(cdoma, cfv(c0, c1)), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cdoma, cfv(c0, c1)), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(c1, cfv(choma, c2), c1)))
-| wi(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(c1, cfv(choma, c2), c1)), wceq(cfv(cdoma, cfv(c0, c1)), c1))

stmt.origin: idahom(c0, c1, cfv(choma, c2), c2, c3, w0)
stmt.pretty: idahom(c0, c1, (HomA ` c2), c2, c3, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(c1, cfv(choma, c2), c1)))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cida, c2))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, ccat))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
-| wceq(cfv(choma, c2), cfv(choma, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cdoma, cfv(c0, c1)), c1))
-| wi(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(c1, cfv(choma, c2), c1)), wceq(cfv(cdoma, cfv(c0, c1)), c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cida, c2))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, ccat))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
-| wceq(cfv(choma, c2), cfv(choma, c2))

stmt.origin: homadm(cfv(c0, c1), c1, cfv(choma, c2), c1, c2)
stmt.pretty: homadm((c0 ` c1), c1, (HomA ` c2), c1, c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(c1, cfv(choma, c2), c1)), wceq(cfv(cdoma, cfv(c0, c1)), c1))
-| wceq(cfv(choma, c2), cfv(choma, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cdoma, cfv(c0, c1)), c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cida, c2))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, ccat))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
-| wceq(cfv(choma, c2), cfv(choma, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(domA `(c0 ` c1))= c1)
⊣ c0 =(IdA ` c2)
⊣ c3 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ Cat)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c3)
⊣ (HomA ` c2)=(HomA ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cdoma, cfv(c0, c1)), c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cida, c2))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, ccat))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))

comment: Domain of the identity arrow. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
